snippet: Christian Falero, who took off his clothes and killed two neighbors in Washington Heights, was found guilty on all charges on Tuesday, as jurors rejected his insanity defense.
abstract: Manhattan man Christian Falero is found guilty on all charges in 2011 murder of two neighbors; had claimed insanity, but prosecutor argued that he was drug addict and had feigned mental illness.
lead_paragraph: Christian Falero, who took off his clothes and killed two neighbors in Washington Heights, was found guilty on all charges on Tuesday, as jurors rejected his insanity defense.

headline.main: Man Who Claimed Insanity Is Convicted in 2011 Murders
headline.print_headline: Man Who Claimed Insanity Is Convicted in 2011 Murders
